snippet.title: Mayhem in Single Valley Teaser 2019
snippet.description:
Help Jack survive his voyage of self-discovery!

Jack, a local troublemaker, makes series earth-shattering discoveries on the day he is supposed to leave home for a new life in the city.

Mayhem in Single Valley is a thoughtful top-down action-adventure game that mixes what we enjoyed most about games like the Last Of Us, Undertale, Pony Island, EarthBound, and Zelda. Its focus on family, friendship, and everyday struggles mixed with its combat, mysteries, puzzles, and meta-fiction ponderings provides an action-packed, humorous, and emotional gameplay experience.
